# Changelog

## 0.2 Series

### 0.2.0
##### 2018-02-19

- Laravel 5.6 compatible
- Cart handles user associations
- Admin UI polishes
- Concord v1.1

## 0.1 Series

### 0.1.1
##### 2017-12-17

- Fixed Billpayer related problems
- Checkout => Order works properly
- Order CRUD on admin has been added
